Package org.hps.recon.tracking.gbl.matrix

Matrix utilities for GBL

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BorderedBandMatrix
    Separate storage of border, mixed and band parts (as vector).
    EigenvalueDecomposition
    Eigenvalues and eigenvectors of a real matrix.
    LUDecomposition
    LU Decomposition.
    Matrix  
    QRDecomposition
    QR Decomposition.
    SymMatrix  
    Vector
    Specializes the Matrix class to a vector.
    VMatrix

    VSymMatrix
